To conﬁrm that we have not messed-up, we can re-load the dataset and summarize the ﬁrst
ﬁve rows.
# load the new file
dataset = read_csv(' household_power_consumption.csv' , header=None)
print(dataset.head())
Listing 16.7: Example of loading the newly saved data ﬁle
Tying all of this together, the complete example of loading, cleaning-up, and saving the
dataset is listed below.

from pandas import read_csv
